sentences.en: Amazingly little is known about human lactation, or nursing.
sentences.cn: 对人类哺育婴儿或哺乳所知甚少.

sentences.en: Even those passengers who were most distrustful of themselves pluck up amazingly.
sentences.cn: 甚至那些对自己最缺乏信心的乘客也令人惊奇地鼓起了勇气。

sentences.en: Everyone seemed to her to be amazingly kind.
sentences.cn: 每个人对她来说都善良得不可思议。

sentences.en: Experienced snowboarders can zip downhill amazingly fast.
sentences.cn: 有经验的滑雪板运动员能够以极快的速度滑下山。

sentences.en: He smiled suddenly, exposing a set of amazingly white teeth.
sentences.cn: 他突然一笑，露出一口雪白的牙齿。

sentences.en: He was amazingly inventive and resourceful, and played a major role in my career.
sentences.cn: 他极具创造力，而且足智多谋，在我的职业生涯中起到了重要的作用。

sentences.en: He'll get over it—young people are amazingly resilient.
sentences.cn: 他会克服这些的—年轻人的适应力惊人。

sentences.en: He's amazingly cheerful considering all that he's been through.
sentences.cn: 鉴于他经历过的种种遭遇,他的乐天达观令人惊叹.

sentences.en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentences.en: I was beginning to feel amazingly sleepy.
In this strange place Eugene flourished amazingly.
sentences.cn: 在这个古怪的地方,尤金出人意料地发展起来.

sentences.en: Luke had an amazingly retentive memory.

sentences.cn: 马尔科姆的工作方法显得极其粗枝大叶。

sentences.en: She was an amazingly good cook.
sentences.cn: 她是个厨艺精湛的厨师。
